name: Energy Heist (robotizarGames)
description:
Energy Heist is an action roguelite where you slay hordes of enemies and face bosses. Your only objective is to steal the energy of their planet and survive. Play as a mercenary, and with the spoils of every run upgrade your weapons, unlock new suits, and upgrade your skill tree.

FEATURES

* Original soundtrack, designed to keep players fully immersed in the gameplay experience* Simple and intuitive controls that are easy to learn
* Over 30 upgrades available for skills, weapons, and characters
* Variety of Mutation Injectors to choose from, granting unique passive effects that change the gameplay experience in each run.
